DOC.brief_title: Local Drug Delivery Aloe Vera Gel Chronic Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Aloe vera consider promising high-ranking agent all-purpose herbal plant amongst herbal agent use dentistry . This study design evaluate clinical microbiological effectiveness locally deliver aloe vera gel adjunct scale root plan treatment chronic periodontitis . Methods : Twelve subject diagnose chronic generalize periodontitis select randomly divide two group : Test group receive scale root planning ( SRP ) follow application aloe vera gel local drug delivery agent deep periodontal pocket control group receive SRP alone . Clinical evaluation undertaken use Plaque index ( PI ) , Gingival index ( GI ) , Probing pocket depth ( PPD ) , Relative attachment level ( RAL ) Gingival marginal level ( GML ) microbiologic count ( total colony count/ml ) assess baseline , 6 week 3 month .
